movies.title: Matrix
movies.plot: Steven Matrix is one of the underworld's foremost hitmen until his luck runs out, and someone puts a contract out on him. Shot in the forehead by a .22 pistol, Matrix "dies" and finds himself in "The City In Between", where he is ...
movies.actors: Nick Mancuso, Phillip Jarrett, Carrie-Anne Moss

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
movies.actors: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones

movies.title: Tenet
movies.plot: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.
movies.actors: John David Washington, Robert Pattinson, Elizabeth Debicki

movies.title: Sharknado
movies.plot: When a freak hurricane swamps Los Angeles, nature's deadliest killer rules sea, land, and air as thousands of sharks terrorize the waterlogged populace.
movies.actors: Ian Ziering, Tara Reid, John Heard

movies.title: Dragonball Evolution
movies.plot: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.
movies.actors: Justin Chatwin, James Marsters, Chow Yun-Fat

movies.title: The Room
movies.plot: Johnny is a successful bank executive who lives quietly in a San Francisco townhouse with his fiancée, Lisa. One day, putting aside any scruple, she seduces Johnny's best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.
movies.actors: Tommy Wiseau, Juliette Danielle, Greg Sestero

movies.title: Troll 2
movies.plot: A vacationing family discovers that the entire town they're visiting is inhabited by goblins, disguised as humans, who plan to eat them.
movies.actors: Michael Paul Stephenson, George Hardy, Margo Prey

movies.title: Thor
movies.plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
movies.actors: Chris Hemsworth, Anthony Hopkins, Natalie Portman

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.
movies.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Mickey Rourke, Gwyneth Paltrow

movies.title: Aquaman
movies.plot: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.
movies.actors: Jason Momoa, Amber Heard, Willem Dafoe
